content:
I understand completely! I'll implement this entire mission autonomously with minimal input needed from you. Here's the first set of commands to create our directory structure and initial templates:

```bash
# Create audience-aware directory structure
mkdir -p docs/claude docs/ai-ai docs/framework docs/charter docs/protocols docs/implementation docs/deployment docs/history docs/templates

# Create template directory for automation scripts
mkdir -p scripts/documentation
```

Please run these commands to set up the initial directory structure. Once complete, I'll provide the next set of commands to create the template files.
